pinpoints.name: The undertaker's house
pinpoints.description: The house of jolly fellow the undertaker. You can shop here and purchase something if you please.

pinpoints.name: Peasant graveyard
pinpoints.description: This location is at the entrance of large graveyard that streches to the north and west from here. But beware, skeletons risen!

pinpoints.name: Merchants rest place
pinpoints.description: Alas, trades gave them a full purse in life, but rest them pennyless after death. Let's give it a try and grab their belongings.

pinpoints.name: Lonely crypt
pinpoints.description: It seemed like a lonely crypt, but it is alone place only for the man lying beneith. Not lonely for you, as a spider awaits for its feed!
